description: A bullish continuation pattern that appears during strong uptrends. The 'flagpole' is a sharp price advance, followed by a rectangular consolidation (the 'flag') before continuation higher. Signals trend will likely resume.

structure: Must have a strong, nearly vertical prior uptrend (the flagpole)
Flagpole should be at least 20-30% price move in short time (ideally 1-5 days)
Consolidation forms a rectangular or slightly downward-sloping channel
Flag portion should be relatively small compared to flagpole (1/3 to 1/2 retracement max)
Flag should last 1-4 weeks on daily charts (shorter on intraday)
Breakout occurs upward through top of flag channel
volume: Very high volume during flagpole formation (aggressive buying)
Volume must decline significantly during flag consolidation (profit-taking phase)
Strong volume spike on breakout above flag confirms continuation
Low volume during flag is critical - high volume suggests distribution, not consolidation
indicators: RSI should pullback to 40-60 range during flag (healthy correction from overbought)
MACD may show slight bearish crossover during flag but histogram should stay relatively flat
Price should stay above key moving averages (20-day, 50-day) during flag
Support/resistance: flag should respect its channel boundaries cleanly
timeframe: Works well on 4H and 1H for swing trading
Less reliable on very short timeframes (<15min) due to noise

invalidation_signals: Volume increasing during flag consolidation (distribution, not accumulation)
Flag portion retraces more than 50% of flagpole (too deep = trend exhaustion)
Price breaks below bottom of flag channel
Flag lasts more than 4-5 weeks (pattern loses validity)
No clear prior uptrend (flagpole missing or weak)
RSI remains overbought (>70) throughout flag (suggests unsustainable rally)
common_mistakes: Confusing with bear pennant (which has converging trendlines, not parallel)
Ignoring flagpole strength - weak flagpole = unreliable pattern
Calling pattern valid when volume is high during flag (distribution signal)
Missing the volume requirement on breakout (weak breakouts often fail)

trade_setup.entry: Enter on breakout above flag's upper boundary with volume confirmation
trade_setup.stop_loss: Place below flag's lower boundary or below midpoint of flag for tighter risk
trade_setup.target: Measure flagpole height, add to breakout point for price target
